website_summaries.verdict: A great pick for families wanting an efficient two-in-one recycling container and trash can.
pros: Dual stainless steel compartments for recycling and trash
Bags stay hidden with specifically-made liners
Pedal makes for an easy, hands-free container opener
cons: Lid only stays raised if foot stays on pedal
Plastic pieces on trash can tend to break

customer_reviews.title: ... with this trashcan at first but it dents so easily. I have zero idea what could’ve caused these ...
customer_reviews.text: I was obsessed with this trashcan at first but it dents so easily. I have zero idea what could’ve caused these dents from the inside out. I have barely had it and don’t ever overfill it (I live alone so know what all goes in it). I don’t put anything in there any other person wouldn’t also. For the price this should absolutely last longer than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey F

customer_reviews.title: **WARNING** Design Flaw!
customer_reviews.text: After exactly 2 1/2 weeks, while lifting the full bag out (manufacturer's bag that cam e with trash can), the plastic piece (see picture) (on the bottom)) bent out, ripped the bag open and is no longer fitted against the side. I will update after contacting customer service...
customer_reviews.author: Neo

customer_reviews.title: Functional and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would spend $200 on a trash can, or write a review about a trash can until now. It looks great and is functional. Yes the trash side is a bit more narrow than a traditional trash can but the overall can is tall so it still holds quite a bit. This is so great for recycling and trash if you have to have a trash can you can see. Would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in SImple Human
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in SImple Human. I own several other SH products and have been very satisfied with those. This product was less than sturdy and scratched when received. I think when you spend $180 on a trash bin, you should get more than what SH is producing.
customer_reviews.author: lynn b

customer_reviews.title: Opens and closes quietly and easily. Most importantly we've started recycling
customer_reviews.text: Ok, never had I thought I would spend this kind of money on a trash can... It's a trash can! But... It's the nicest trash cans I've ever owned, hands down! Stays clean on the outside. Opens and closes quietly and easily. Most importantly we've started recycling... We've actually filled our recycling bin to the brim for pick up. I thought loosing space for trash would be a problem but the recycling aspect is pretty awesome and has reduced how much trash we throw away. Highly recommend if you want to recycle and reduce your trash output.
customer_reviews.author: Ambar

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this a little over a year ago and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a little over a year ago and the slow-close lid function has already broken. For $200, ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Chic, Modern, Not Bulk & Fits More
customer_reviews.text: A gorgeous product! I chose white because the new appliances in my kitchen are white. My old trash can was round and took up more space, BUT it fit less trash, and blocked the dishwasher door, which was annoying. The Simplehuman trash can takes up less space, yet fits way more trash. It's ultra chic, modern, and stays very clean. It's easy to change the liner, and it's nice having the trash bags on hand, as there is an aperture inside that fits trash bags. The product does come with 20 trash bags, but I won't be buying their bags, as my own work just fine. Check out the pics I posted--they compliment my kitchen very well!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Leon

customer_reviews.title: Great for homeowners
customer_reviews.text: It really helps the kids to recycle with the blue trashcan inside. It's a little bit smaller than I thought but it definitely gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: C Lite

customer_reviews.title: Impresive looking Trash can
customer_reviews.text: Slick and clean looking and the stainless steel body doesn't get dirty (fingerprints) easily. Trash bag is completely concealed on the outside (thoughtful design.) Does accommodate the store bought 13 gallon tall trash bags snugly. My only issue, if i can call it that, is that the trash can is light in weight, hence it moves around easily when using it. I did manage to give it more stability by inserting a brick on the bottom, and that didn't get in the way of the trash bag. The brick took care of the stability issue and that Trash Can is going nowhere. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Pasha

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price tag
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around a long time before buying an expensive trash can. But this thing is great, and no matter how much time I've put into decorating my house, it's still the only thing that my husband/guy friends notice. I got nice decals for the lid on Amazon so no one is confused about what goes where. I think it's improved our recycling rate. The trash bin is smaller than standard size trash bags, but I like the Simple Human version anyways. I love that there is a bag dispenser in the back of the can. If you're committed to your normal trash bags, they still work but don't get quite as full.
customer_reviews.author: Julia San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less then a year...
customer_reviews.text: Don't spend $200 on a barbage can which won't even last a year. We use this unit several times a day and it could not even last a year. Purchased July 24th 2019 and Broker on May 1st 2020. How does a $200 unit does not last longer? NOW I have to go through warranties and all the headaches of mingling with receipts, pictures, sku numbers etc... I hope Simple human is as good at their warranty process as accepting the payments...
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: DENTED JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Giant dent from a “new” purchase. What a waste of money! Do not buy this trash. Appears they send used or damaged products. Zero quality control.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Will not honor warranty
customer_reviews.text: Received and using the simple human 58 liter dual trash and recycle can. We are enjoying the trash/recycle can, however, I am unable to register the can for the 10 year warranty. Simple Human will no honor my registration of their 58 liter dual can since they failed to add a UPC number on their product. Yes, I searched for the UPC number on their can per their list of possible locations. The UPC was not placed on their can when packaged. Therefore, Simple Human will not honor their 10 year warranty on a $199.00 can.
customer_reviews.author: NC Customer

customer_reviews.title: ISSUE:  Lid not designed to stay open
customer_reviews.text: The biggest design flaw is that the lid - in its normal working mode - is not designed to stay open when kitchen duties require having the lid open to easily discard food prep materials. You can open the lid and locking ring TOGETHER, but then the bag falls in due to the locking ring being open. Given the price point, this is a deal breaker that results in a 3-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Motorhead

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: For Amazon and the carrier used to transport my shipment. 1) it was late 2) it was damaged very bad. For the manufacturer 1) there should be dunnage to absorb shocks
customer_reviews.author: Christo John

customer_reviews.title: I guess we GET what we pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is truly amazing, never thought I'd say that about a trash can! It is the epitome of functionality, style, & elegance. I needed a place for recyclables and have so much more. The bags are a bit smaller than regular size which is great for me as it will keep odor under control. The lid has a slow self close allowing plenty of hands-free time to put the trash in. It shuts nice and level. Easy to change bags which are not visible when the lid is closed. Odd thing to pay $200 for a "trash/recycle station" but you won't regret it!!! 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Shrinkgirl

customer_reviews.title: meh...
customer_reviews.text: i tried to do a lot of research before spending so much on a trash can. I was happy when this arrived but when i started using it i noticed the lid was rather resistant to raising up and it increasingly became harder to lift despite no damage or improper use with the trash can. there were wear marks where the lid was catching the back of the rim and lifting the rim up with it when it lifted. Im disappointed with the purchase and contacted simplehuman. they shipped a replacement so we will see if this one is any better. additionally, i found the same trash can 50 dollars cheaper at target after i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Several design flaws, though attractive...
customer_reviews.text: Problems: The pedal is spongy and frequently only lifts the lid half-way. The surface is easily dinged. The interior pocket for spare bags frequently snags trash when trying to remove full bags and tears the bag, or makes it very difficult to remove. Magnets don't stick to stainless steel, but they adhere to this can, indicating it's either partially stainless, or not at all and made of a different material (aluminum perhaps given the propensity for dings). Secondary opening for changing the bag doesn't open to a full 90 degrees, making it difficult to remove bags. Pros: Attractive design, secondary opening a good idea though poorly executed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hanley

customer_reviews.title: BEST MANDATORY PURCHASE EVER
customer_reviews.text: I never thought that I would say this regarding the purchase of a trash can, but this is the BEST trash can EVER. Stop thinking so hard about it and buy it. So convenient. So easy to use. Carries a LOT of trash. Really durable and high quality. EASY TO CLEAN. Gone are the days of having to hose down a gross trash can due to the bags breaking - the bags that come with these (they give you a sample pack to start!) are unbeatable. I just wish they made a diaper pail too so I could buy that from them as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: Dog Resistant
customer_reviews.text: I have never been able to keep my dog out of the trash unless it was behind a closed door. My new residence does not have such a luxery and I splurged on this expensive rubbish bin. Best decision I ever made. The lip of the lid covers plastic trash bag my dog would normally use to pull and tip the bin over. The bin is also nice and heavy which makes it much more difficult for my dog to pull it over. I have had this trash bin for over 2 months, and my dog has yet to get into the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Bin But Bag Size is Problematic
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality bin and we like it a lot. Only complaint is that the height of the trash bag needed is very large and the "normal" 13-gallon kitchen trash bags we're bought are too short......such that when bag is about half full the weight of the trash makes the bag slip down. The sample bags that came with the bin don't do this of course because they're made to fit the bins. I'm sure the manufacturer does this purposely to get you to buy their bags, which cost twice as much as the "normal" store-bought bags.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Graves

customer_reviews.title: 5 star customer service! 1 recommendation though...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, pretty convenient. We had an issue with our lid slow close feature breaking after 1 yr. The lid just slammed down. I emailed Simplehuman and they just notified me that they are overnighting a brand new replacement. Great company. In my opinion, a feature upgrade.... some sort of air flow or hole in bottom of can bc it can be tough to pull the bag out if filled up to brim. I've had to take the whole can out to trash outside because the liner ripped apart trying to pull out of can. Now, I just dont fill all the way because I dont want to drill holes. Great product, other than that!
customer_reviews.author: prin05

customer_reviews.title: It looks great! There's just a few details that could be ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price I would have expected less wear and tear to show so early on. About a month after, the powder coat was scraped just from daily use of the lid. There was a small dent in the bottom - even though it came in two boxes and seemed to be package tightly - must have been from handling. It looks great! There's just a few details that could be cleaned up.
customer_reviews.author: Maetoes

customer_reviews.title: Best can ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best can ever. Always comparing similar cans that my friends and family have and all the others aren’t as nice. This one opens and closed very easily, is easy to keep clean and doesn’t break. Just be careful when you throw heavy stuff into it as you can dent the metal and put little dings in it. I love that my cat can not get into it! And you don’t need to use the simple human bags if you don’t want as it will also take regular size garbage bags as well. I clean mine with glass plus on the outside and also inside the rim and under the lid. Keeps it clean!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: From 5 stars to 2 :(
customer_reviews.text: I was most definitely a five star rating until after owning for 9 months, I have noticed 6 or 7 rust spots on the inside of the can. I am really bummed that the "Stainless Steel" can is apparently not stainless in the inside of the can. This was intended to be a rather long term investment into a nice kitchen can. I plan to contact customer support when I am able and see how the warranty holds up. I will update once this issue is resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Chad David

customer_reviews.title: I'm excited about this trash can, too.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and it's entirely functional. The silver part on the top does get smudgy, but the white part does not. I had an entirely silver older model before this one, and I wasn't sure about the changes, but this new style IS much better. I do not miss the can inside of a can now that I know how reliable the liner rim is. I also wasn't sure what size to order, as the dimensions for my old can didn't match up with either size of the new ones. I went with the 45 liter and it's perfect. I can use regular trash bags with it, which is what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Beautifull and functional. Real stainless steel. Sturdy. Handsome desing. Soft close lid.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this dual can. I use it for recyclables. One side for cardboard/paper and the other side for cans/bottles. ONE CAVEAT: This only comes with ONE inside CONTAINER. The other side they want you to use bags. I ordered an extra container from SimpleHuman website. It was reasonable and free shipping so now it's perfect for dual recyclables.
customer_reviews.author: SmittyNYUSA

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, High Quality Combo
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of having a separate trash can and recycler. I was looking for a combo that was relatively compact, and made of a high quality material like stainless steel. This works great and looks great. And as a bonus, simplehuman has its own brand of trash bags with one-letter codes that mean your bags will fit perfectly every time (and even a blue option for the recycling). Oh, and did I mention it's smudge-free? Can't beat that. Looks great, and very easy to use. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: LA.2.NYC

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but feels like quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing is stupid expensive considering it's a TRASH CAN. But I'm a member of the buy-it-for-life club and so far this thing is holding up. I've had it for a few months and still no issues. The capacity is slightly smaller than my last trash can, but it reminds me to recycle more and waste less. I'm happy with it, I just hope they can get to a more reasonable price point for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad to make the investment
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and looks great in my kitchen. I bought two, one for recycle and one for regular trash. They are must more sturdy than I expected. The feature that I was surprised about that I didn't realized I liked was the storage of new bags in the back. In the past, itt was always a unspoken struggle as to who was going to find the garbage bags and put one in the can. Now it's as easy, pull out full garbage bag, reach in to empty can and put in new bag. So very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bronwyn Betts

customer_reviews.title: All the little details add up to considerable benefit.  definitely worth the high price tag.
customer_reviews.text: I thought myself insane for contemplating paying this princely sum for of all things a garbage can. That said, no regrets. Exceeded expectations. One may ask why. Answer: 1) No mess with garbage. The bags fit perfectly, are strong, and are cost effective enough to buy them instead of ill-fitting bags. 2) Because removal of garbage is so easy and clean, there is less incentive to be lazy and cram too much into a garbage bag. It keeps things cleaner. 3) Looks nice. The bag does not show up. it's attention to the little details that, when summed up, provide great benefit. 4) Easy, non-battery operated, foot pedal. Never have to replace batteries.
customer_reviews.author: kj

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturers defect
customer_reviews.text: This is the second trash can I've bought from simple human. Unfortunately, this one had a pretty significant indentation on the surface of the top lid. Looks to be a manufacturing quality issue. I'm afraid my guests will notice the flaw; so, I am very disappointed due to this and I really don't want to bother with returning it. Oh, well. This is what happens when you buy too much simple human product while expecting the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Van Luong Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: This recycle/trash can is excellent. It's the perfect size for my kitchen and ...
customer_reviews.text: This recycle/trash can is excellent. It's the perfect size for my kitchen and I love the dual purpose. It is so easy to lift the recycle bin out and the trash is taken out a lot more often with less whining. The bags fit perfectly and the replacement is right there! No more hunting for new bags that don't fit properly. It is really easy to keep clean too. One of my best buys!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can, if you can afford it.
customer_reviews.text: These bins are so great, the quality really is #1 they are just so pricey it's hard to justify the expense. I bought this to be a hands free poo bin for dog waste in the yard. It sits under an awning out back and it works great because it keeps the smell in, is just the right size for the pooper scooper & it's hands free. The only downside? I worry someone will steal it and I have to bring it inside in the winter because I don't want to risk it getting damaged. I love this bin cuz it works great, but I hate that I have to worry about it cuz it cost me so much.
customer_reviews.author: Shana M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality trash can.
customer_reviews.text: Like others, didn't want to spend this much on a trash can. However, it was going to be visible in the kitchen, and with two larger type dogs, needed something to keep them out. This trash can really does/is everything you could expect from a trash can. Solid, solid construction. Easy to clean and we have had trash in the can for 4-5 days and no odor. What else could you expect from a trash can?
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett

customer_reviews.title: Lid is plastic (appears to be stainless) be careful trying to clean it
customer_reviews.text: Loved this trash can for about two weeks until I had to clean the lid from a spill. I used a soft plastic “scrubber” that is made for delicate products (ie crystal), and stainless steel cleaner that I use on all of my stainless products. The lid, which appears and feels like stainless, is obviously plastic and was DESTROYED by just trying to clean it. The coating was removed and there are scratches all over the lid now. It looks absolutely terrible. I went back and read nothing saying that the lid is not actually stainless. I have never been so disappointed in a product and am upset every time I see the ruined lid.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: It's a well-built garbage can
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a daily deal for about 40% off, so I took the plunge and for pay it's fine. It's a very nice garbage can, with a built-in recycling container. Beyond that, it seems to be built out of decent quality materials with good workmanship and it has a nice slow-close feature so it doesn't clang shut. Would I buy it again if I had it to do over? I'm not sure. It's a lot of money for a thing that just holds the junk you are throwing away, but I like the convenience of the recycling bin, and it has some nice touches. Value here seems like a very subjective thing.
customer_reviews.author: NJ.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this garbage can for three reasons: 1. Smudge proof 2. Can’t see the garbage bag thanks to the clever design 3. Looks really nice This is a an incredibly functioning garbage can worth the price tag. I use the simple human garbage bags because they fit perfectly and I enjoy the compartment that is built in. I don’t have to go under the kitchen sink fetching a garbage bag anymore. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: You want me to spend WHAT?  On a trash can?  ABSOLUTELY!
customer_reviews.text: Best kitchen trash can I have ever had! I hesitated for years, no decades, spending this much on a kitchen trash can. I finally broke down and did it. Now I am saying, “Why did I wait so long?!” Don’t hesitate, don’t wait going through one, two or three more trash cans, get it now! You’ll be glad you did. Worth every penny and more. I never would have thought that I could get excited over a kitchen trash can, until I found simple human trash cans. Beautifully designed, esthetically pleasing, and does what it is supposed to do, does it nicely and quietly, too.
customer_reviews.author: Wagslady

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I’m not usually the kind of person who spends a couple of hundred dollars on a garbage can, but I am so glad I bought this! It’s the perfect size and looks clean and sharp in my kitchen. I love the recycling bucket so I don’t have to use bags on that side. And I do love the custom fit garbage bags that came with it, but I will go back to my regular 13 gallon kitchen bags when those run out. And they work just as well. I highly recommend this product and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan L.

customer_reviews.title: No More Trashcan Drama!
customer_reviews.text: Before we had this trashcan, our dogs would mess with the trash and I would have to keep it in a cabinet or always watch the dogs and get after them to leave it alone. This one is perfect as I have less under-the-counter space and needed to leave it out. I use one side for recycling and one side for trash. I even bought another one for the laundry room. I use one side for the dog food and one side for the trash. I use the regular tall kitchen Kirkland bags in them and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bar

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable but pedal seems flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: It feels flimsier than i thought it would for something that cost more than $100. I'm afraid to step down on open pedal mechanism because i'm afraid i'll bend it out of shape just by applying pressure to the wrong place. It's heavy otherwise and bulkier than expected because the lid hinge leaves a gap between the wall an the back of the main container. It's not bad but i would like to not feel afraid to step on the pedal.
customer_reviews.author: W. tom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stainless trash can!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend a lot of money on a stainless trash can but I took the chance. I wanted stainless to match my appliances. It does live up to the description. It looks great and works great! I use regular kitchen bags however not the bags that are tucked in the can. It never seems to get dirty looking. I’ve had it 2 months and hope it looks new forever!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Lid will not open all of the way over time.
customer_reviews.text: For a product this outrageously expensive, it should work like a world class product. THIS IS NOT A WORLD CLASS PRODUCT. Over time, as you step on the open lever, the lid will only open a few inches, and you have to hold it open the rest of the way with your hand. Absolute fail. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: John Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best product I have ever bought from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is to die for - love the easy ability to remove recycle bin and it holds about 3 days worth of normal recycling. Love the easy to use trash liners that came with the can, and I ordered additional liners thru Amazon because the price is about the same as buying 13 gallon liners in the store, and these fit PERFECTLY!! Peddle opens the trash bin, but it closes automatically. It is worth every penny...
customer_reviews.author: hendris1@nevada.edu

customer_reviews.title: Sleek trash can; doesn’t look bad in plain sight!
customer_reviews.text: Our kitchen doesn’t have a fancy roll-out cabinet/drawer for the trash can, so we had to find one to put in plain sight. We’ve enjoyed our bathroom trash cans by this brand, so we thought we’d go big! What we like most is that there’s an extra lip to hide the trash bag, so you can tuck it under that rim instead of having your bag show on the outside. It’s sturdy, and even though the price is a little steep, it’s worth it for us since it’s in plain sight and doesn’t bring down the look of our kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh Veca Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is seriously the best trash can I’ve ever used and I’m such an ...
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the best trash can I’ve ever used and I’m such an old married lady since I’m actually writing a review of a trash can; it’s embarrassing actually. It was actually worth the $100 or more I paid for it! You don’t have to use the expensive bags. I get a goodsmelling 10gallon bag from Walmart for much cheaper and they work well. I also buy this roll of 8 gallons too that you can put in the back and stick through the slot.
customer_reviews.author: C. Montejo

customer_reviews.title: Classy AF
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying my wife went nuts when she found out I spent $100+ on a trash can. But that quickly changed because this thing is awesome. The fitted bags get held in place and there's a sticker that lets you know the bags are running low. It looks great, functions great, and somehow the bags (when full and pulled out) remain in this perfectly rectangular shape standing upright. Never in my life would I have thought a trash can could bring me so much joy. I know, that sounds really weird. But it's the truth. Oh and one more thing, it comes with a 10-year warranty which pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL M

customer_reviews.title: customer service not responding to report of a damaged product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the product knowing that it will look nice and be functional when placed in my kitchen area. It looks overall nice but I was disappointed to find big dent when I opened the box. Also the claim that surface is smudge-free, doesn't quite live up. Like the fact that I have both recycle and trash in one place though I may need to order another trash can for recycle since recycle bin is not large enough. I reported to SimpleHuman customer service but no response from them and it's been five days so I decided to write this review. Overall not receiving the customer experience I would like for a $199 trashcan.
customer_reviews.author: VikLad

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy bags!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this garbage can!!! I can’t believe I’m writing about a garbage can! Lol if your looking for a garbage can that has the duo recycled part and garbage in one, this one is a perfect size. It’s not to bulky and the design is really nice. It is Honestly A breeze to clean up if you have and its super easy to just grab the handle for the recycling part to dump into our larger can outside.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: I usually love all Simple Human Products
customer_reviews.text: This is the first SH product I don’t like. I usually recommend and reach for SH products regardless of price because they last and the quality is great. However, this garbage can is Really disappointing. Number one thing that drives my family crazy is that it squeaks everytime you close it!! It started from when it was brand new, so it’s not from overuse. Also, the bag always come loose from the can so I would have to reach in the bag to pull out the strings. I’m not sure if it’s just that mine is defective or if they all have these problems... I am not sure how to fix this, and it’s upsetting because it was very pricy.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: The Gift That Keeps on Giving
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for a FY2017 Christmas gift for my parents. They have used it for about 6 months and love it. It opens very easily, holds a larger amount of garbage; holds the smells of stinky foods when closed. It's very easy to switch out the garbage bags (I bought them a large supply of the bags that go with this trash can). It goes very well with a home with stainless steel appliances. This trash can is so well liked that my brother bought one for his family and others have requested information on cost and where I purchased it (Amazon of course).
customer_reviews.author: K K Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I like this trash can. For the size it does what I wanted. I bought the can back in 2017 and one of the hinges just recently broke. It has a crack so still functional but the lid opens and closes differently. I contacted simple human. Without any questions or hassle they are sending me a new unit. I just sent pictures of the hinge and serial number. I will have the new can in 4 days. This impresses me beyond belief. A whole new can!!! I would have gladly fixed the old one. I disassemble it frequently for cleaning. The hinge area holds a lot of crap. They have earned a true life long customer with this service.
customer_reviews.author: Guru1200

customer_reviews.title: Quality trash tote
customer_reviews.text: I planned on spending less for a 2 compartment trash recycling bin but ultimately decided on this due to the 10 yr warranty and good looks. After reading reviews for almost every bin available I figure they all have come dented at some point but simplehuman has corrected this by adding large corner blocks in the double boxed package, my first one showed up in good condition. The bin sits firmly on the ground so it doesn't feel like it will move easily while operating.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Goodson

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product and service!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t recommend this product and company enough!! We’ve loved this trash can since we got it almost 3 years ago. It’s incredibly well made and looks great in our kitchen. It was packaged extremely well and arrived perfect. Recently, our hinge gave out so I emailed Simplehuman customer support. They responded almost immediately and were super nice, professional, and helpful. Then, they replaced our unit with no charge what so ever!
customer_reviews.author: D. Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Silly to Love a Trash Can? Yes. No.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fully built and ready to work. My perfectionism swooned at how perfectly the sample garbage bag fit. This is the first time I've had a pedal-operated device, and that may be why I'm exceedingly enamored but it's taken my kitchen garbage life up a few notches. It lives pressed against a wall in the corner. Move it out a few inches to fully open the inner lid come trash day I now almost look forward to.
customer_reviews.author: Jan McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Best Trash receptacle  Money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: Second simple human can Just wanted newly improved style. You cannot wear these things out. Well worth the money. Will last you forever unless you want to change styles. Stop looking. Buy this one. You’ll love it. I don’t purchase their expensive bags. I simply use Glad Forceflex PlusTall Kitchen. They perfectly fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Easler

customer_reviews.title: Below average can, with bad material
customer_reviews.text: Pricey trashcan for the material used and versatility it brings. Fingerprints are VERY noticeable. Foot pedal already sticking. The lid gets caught in the upper right corner of the trashcan lip, leaving behind dust from the chafing of plastic on plastic. Regular 13 gallon trash bags fit awkwardly in here; you must stuff the excess bags under the lip otherwise they look ridiculous sticking out. Does not trap smells well either.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great but not impressive
customer_reviews.text: Very nice garbage can. Only took away a star because of the price and for the fact that the top is not very sturdy. Just moving the garbage can (empty) causes a ton of flex. Don't get me wrong, it is the best garbage can I have owned but not sure I would pay that much again. $175 is where I would rate the worth of this can. Still has plastic parts that can fail. For the price, it shouldn't have a single piece of plastic on it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: New Rubbish bin for my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Complements my kitchen nicely. Love the soft close lid, the bags fit perfectly, but I will use regular bags after the complimentary bags are done. Generous size inside, I notice that there is no liner in like most Simplehuman cans, no biggie, less to wash out. 😉 Can't say enough, love my trash can.
customer_reviews.author: British & Totally Bionic 🇬🇧

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I like the ability to recycle on one side and use trash on the other without having 2 separate bins. I also like the trash bag dispenser that is built in the unit. Cons: The recycle bin and it’s handle are flimsy. The thin plastic piece that holds the handle broke within the first week. No big deal, I just removed the handle and you can still remove the bin with ease. Good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Brown

customer_reviews.title: Solid Container!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness of this dual bin can. I purchased the recycle/waste liners made for this can. I like that this one has equal sized Trash and Recycle bins where most I saw were varied. The top opens and closes smooth and my dogs have not figured out how to open the low profile lid! I've only had this a week but I think this was a good buy! If there was anything I would change about the design, it would be to have the bag dispenser on both sides (currently just on trash side) and a removable bin on both sides (currently just on the recycle side).
customer_reviews.author: MissPink

customer_reviews.title: The best experience I've had with Amazon and this company
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this can, set it up and 2 hours in I saw that there was a tiny dent in the lid. Since this is a relatively expensive can, I was bummed. And I had already started using it. But I wrote to Amazon and they sent a new one immediately, with a return slip for the damaged one and all. New one was perfect and the old one went back straight away. Service great and the can is great.
customer_reviews.author: dennis b weston jr.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful trash can but came dented.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but came slightly dented. I'm sure it was the shippers it took a while to get here. Nonetheless if I'm going to pay this much for a trash can I don't want it dented right from the start. I will be returning this
customer_reviews.author: Rosario Mendez

customer_reviews.title: ... at the first use -- previous model was mich better
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and hinges in plastic -- it broke at the first use -- previous model was mich better
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Rey

customer_reviews.title: Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Had the best experience and taking the time to share! After using the trash can for 13 months and with 8 kids in the house- the step broke. I contacted customer support to see if a replacement step could be purchased separately. To my surprise, they sent me a new trash can!! I loved my trash can before, but now I'm certain I'll never purchase another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug235

customer_reviews.title: Keeps paws & little hands out
customer_reviews.text: We switched to this dual can mainly bc we have a very curious pup who liked to lick certain items we’d recycle. I do miss our old simplebhman trash can bc of the lid-locking feature, & that you could use your hand OR or the step to open the lid. With this trash can you can only open by stepping on the pedal. We did take out the blue recycle insert & have since used it to collect plastic bags which cannot be included with our recycling. Thank you simplehuman for yet another awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Greatest trash can on the planet? Almost...
customer_reviews.text: With great trash and recycling power comes a great trash and recycling bin cost. And while that reeks of Spiderman cliche, it's the truth. This is a great trash and recycling bin in every way. I love the easy access to the trash bags built-in, and I love how easy it is to maintain and the build quality. What I don't love is the price, but given its durability and the ultra-long warranty, it's still worth it. That said, maybe save up some Amazon gift cards, or at least use the Amazon Prime card so you get 5% back on it to soften the blow.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hall

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented...TWICE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this brand because I had a smaller version for 10 years and loved it. I was willing to spend the $200 for this bigger can to rid myself of the cardboard box I used for recycling. Unfortunately, upon opening the Amazon box, then the Simple Human box inside, to pull the can out, I found a huge dent in the side. No problem. Free returns and will ship another, toute de suite. The second arrived only to find the same issue. On a smaller level, but a dent nonetheless. And I don't want to spend $200 for a damaged trash can. Disappointed. I wish I could write a real review of the can itself for interested consumers.
customer_reviews.author: EPSG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great value! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this chic, quality trash can. It’s easy to clean, and super convenient to use. It’s a perfect size for a typical kitchen. It’s so convenient that the extra trash bags are stored in the back of it, makes changing the liners a breeze. It’s exceeded all my expectations and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Milica P.

customer_reviews.title: Great trash and recycle bin for the kitchen - bags are costly
customer_reviews.text: this trashcan is everything they say on the description - easy step open, easy empty (both sides). the only issue is, custom bags that you have to buy from manufacturer (yep, they got you locked in) and they're expensive (x4 the cost of normal kitchen bags). so, I'll be searching the internet to find a bag that fits and doesn't cost so much. all in all, very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Berkman

customer_reviews.title: So sad that I love a trash can, but I do
customer_reviews.text: Where I live, we have to divide our recyclables. So even though I had a trash can for trash, I needed a two compartment trash can for recyclables. This trash can, although pricey, is perfect for us. It fits nicely under the kitchen window and leaves plenty of room to get by. Our recyclables fit great. It is easy to empty. It stays put and doesn't slide along the floor. It is smudge-proof. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can at an extremely high price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash can from Simple Human. If you have money to throw away in the trash, throw it away in this one. Unreasonable price for a trash can, but hey it's Simple Human. After you buy this you will be a broke human. I recommend this if you have nothing else to do with your money, but can say you have a Simple Human trash can. You know what you're buying if you purchase this. Top notch quality. They get you on the back end with their custom fitted trash bags, so you know you will always be throwing away money even after you purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Tuan Tran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to instantly upgrade your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Althogh it's expensive, this is the BEST trash can I've ever purchased. It's the perfect size for a small kitchen's and even larger kitchens. I really like the wide step at the bottom, making it very easy to open it from most angles. The bag holder inside the trash can is also a very handy feature! You can store ANY 13 gallon trash bag which is also very handy, for those who dont want to purchase Simple humans 13 gallon bags. Lastly, the slow closing feature adds an elegant/modern touch which my partner really likes.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Not That Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year and a half ago. It works well and looked nice, but the foot opening mechanism no longer opens the can all the way and the lid is falling apart. For the price I expect it to last at least 3 years. I came on Amazon to order another, but I think I'll ship around a bit first since it only lasted about 16 mos.
customer_reviews.author: L. Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of this trash can but the material it’s made out of dents easily. I have 3 kids and I thought by buying a nice trash can from a great company that it would hold up through the years. Unfortunately, it’s been a month and the top of the trash can has small dings in it. Feeling let down and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A R

customer_reviews.title: Well made, attractive
customer_reviews.text: We have only had the trashcan for a week but so far it works out well. It appears well-made and the depth is sturdy. I have had double trash cans in the past where the steps fall off. It’s nice to have the trash bag container attached to the trashcan. I just wish they made a larger version of this double trashcan for recycling and trash.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Stinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Home decor piece, even better trash can
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend as a housewarming gift. It might seem a bit odd to get a garbage can as a new home gift, but this one is different. Ever since I got my first simple human trash can I have used nothing else. They are amazing. You also don't have to use their proprietary bags, pretty much any standard size trash bag fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Simple, non-trashy solution for all your garbage
customer_reviews.text: After having this item on my wish list for over a year, I finally overcame the price tag. I previously had two garbage cans in my kitchen, one for recycling and one for garbage. It looked trashy-pun intended ;) Although this solution was pricy, it’s elegatly designed and fits nicely in my kitchen. It’s clearly a good quality garbage can that will last for decades. While the Simple Human garbage can liners are convenient, the Kirkland signature brand liners work just fine, too. It was worth the splurge.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Cass

customer_reviews.title: Great Waste Container but - Stainless steel top gets dirty/smudgy fast!
customer_reviews.text: We love it. It looks great in our kitchen. Love the amount of stuff you can get into it and the bags are the best we've ever had. You can't break them and they hold a ton. Here's the down side. The stainless steel cover gets dirty or smudgy just by looking at it. If you are a clean freak you will be wiping it every time you walk by. That having been said I would buy it again but I wish they had a white plastic cover as an option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best garbage can, maybe.
customer_reviews.text: Very pricey for a garbage can, the “smudge-proof” only lasted about 2 days before fingerprints covers the top. However, the opening mechanism is very smooth and very quiet, and I didn’t need to take the top off to replace the garbage bag is something I didn’t know I wanted so much. I had a motion sensor can before, but this trumps that in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Jianyu Chen

customer_reviews.title: Not so nice
customer_reviews.text: I splurged on this trashcan, because I wanted one that held both recycling and trash in one container. Unfortunately, after a few months of owning my "fancy" trashcan, it's broken. When I step on the right side of the foot pedal, the trashcan barely opens and when the foot pedal is released, the lid slams shut. The left and center part of the pedal does exactly what it's supposed to (opens all the way and slowly closes). I'm glad this thing has a 10 year warranty. I just hope Simplehuman honors it and doesn't make me jump through hoops like another reviewer complained about.
customer_reviews.author: aadams

customer_reviews.title: Increased recycling efforts with new bin
customer_reviews.text: Great duel bin trash and recycling container. Having a recycling bin adjacent to my trash bin makes recycling so much easier. It also has forced me to be more conscious of how waste non-recyclable waste I produce. You give up overall volume for the convenience of two ware bins so be aware you will seem to dumb the bums more often. Still well with the month in my opinion. Recommend some magnetic trash and recycling labels for the top.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Is it weird to love a garbage can?
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect to love a garbage can this much. Bought it to replace a very old SH model that my husband owned and we didn’t know what bags it used anyway. Seriously.,,taking the trash bag out and putting in a new one is almost fun now! And yes the bags are expensive but we don’t have to double bag since the bags are very strong. You can fit more trash because the bags fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineB

customer_reviews.title: Quality trash can
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly where I planned to place it. I love the slow close feature on the lid and the storage location for bags. This item comes with a box of trash bags. It is worth the price. I like that availability of different finishes. I purchased the model with dual containers. The recycling container side is so convenient and easy to remove to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: The Best Trash Can I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a really nice, good quality, stainless steel trash can. This exceeded all of my expectations! I love the look, and I love the fact that you open the lid by pushing the pedal at the base. It's not just that that makes it nice, but that once you let your foot off of the pedal the lid slowly glides down and makes little to no noise. The perfect addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a single compartment trash can
customer_reviews.text: Very nice trash can, but very expensive for a single compartment. But I am returning because I thought it had two compartments. The reviews and features of trash bin shopping can be confusing. I wanted the dual compartment. I guess that is the 58 liter can.. A Simple human mistake on my part:) An easy return and hopefully a smooth refund process. I will probably be purchasing the double one ...
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but good
customer_reviews.text: We remodeled the kitchen and needed a rectangular can. Saw a similar can from a competitor fro about half the price and gave it a try. That one broke after a couple months of normal use. Bit the bullet and paid the extra $ for this Simple Human can (when did trash cans get so costly?). It works great. Lid is easy to operate and silent. We used up the Simple human liners that came with it and now are just using normal trash bags.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Will Make You Fall In Love
customer_reviews.text: I never in my life envisioned loving a garbage can but man oh man this is the coolest, sleekest and best garbage can ever! This is the Rolls Royce of garbage cans, it just oozes class and elegance. I deal with a lot of smelly food that needs to be disposed of properly and this piece does the trick! Almost entirely odorless, smudge proof and just cool as heck to work!! Changing a bag takes a second and while I have yet to try the bags they came with, my 13 gallon bags I had before fit perfectly... Love this garbage can, and thats words I never expected to say...
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S Kornbluth

customer_reviews.title: Best garbage can
customer_reviews.text: I have never before in my life proclaimed my love for a garbage can, but i love this garbage can! My costco garbage bags fit perfectly, it opens with ease, closes softly and is pretty to boot. I love that the can has both a lid AND a rim so that you can open both to place a garbage bag and hide the top of it. It is amazing to think of how much time and effort went into designing this but it shows, this garbage can is flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Donny S.

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer.
customer_reviews.text: I bit the bullet and ordered this dual trash-recycle can. Overall, this one had the best reviews and best dimensions for my kitchen. It arrived quickly and was easy to set up. I am happy to say this expensive trash can is a game changer. It makes my kitchen look so much nicer!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ProfileName

customer_reviews.title: Love the garbage can BUT....
customer_reviews.text: I love this garbage can BUT I noticed it has a tiny dent on the top of the lid if you look at it in the right angle. The packaging was not very protective for shipping. I do use my regular tall kitchen garbage bags for it and they work just fine. I love how the lid slowly and quietly closes. Other then the tiny dent in the top of lid I would have given it a 5 star but the packaging was poor which probably resulted in the tiny dent in the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Sexiest Trash Can Alive?
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would rave about a trash can but here we go - this trash can does so many things right - great design, looks beautiful and has just the right capacity for a single person. I love the shape, replacing bags is very easy and the bags are sturdy. The can is easy to clean and seems like it will last for years to come. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zaton

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!! Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect! It allows us to keep recycling top of mind and has drastically cut back on how often we empty the trash because of it. I know it’s worrisome that the compartments are smaller than typical trash cans but the fact that you have both right next to one another makes it worth it. We are only a family of two but we did not need to empty the trash anymore than we did before with out “regular” size trash can.
customer_reviews.author: CorFamily

customer_reviews.title: Very good trashcan, worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very good size trashcan, super easy to clean! On the pricier side but worth it, I had one for like 2 years still in perfect condition (bought from The Container Store). I bought this one for my bf's house. P.s. the trash bag from Costco will fit in this trashcan if you don't want to buy their trash bag (which is durable)
customer_reviews.author: Gwen C.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a new kitchen garbage can that would also hold recycling, I cringed at the price of this but based on reviews (especially Frugal Tom’s) I decided to order and try this one out. Best garbage can every, highly recommend. Looks great and functions great. Can use 13 gal kitchen bags in it and I also use large blue recycle bags on recycling side. Words I never thought I would say "I love this garbage can!"
customer_reviews.author: JenMor

customer_reviews.title: Bought this a few years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Still looks brand new & the non-slamming lid is great. The side by side bins are a little small but I wouldn't want the unit to be any bigger. Not sure what the price for this is these days but I paid more than $200 for this one. I've seen a lot of competitors come out with these type of dual canisters since my purchase so maybe the price has dropped a bit.
customer_reviews.author: ~Sully~

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy another product except this one
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I have been looking for something just like this. It is just exactly what I wanted. I was hesitant about spending the money but I would buy it every time now. It really is worth more than the money I spent on it. Great product..
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta Lady

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful! I previously had a bin for my normal ...
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful! I previously had a bin for my normal kitchen trash can and a separate trash can for my recyclables. I don't generate a lot of trash or recyclables so this side by side is perfect. My kitchen looks so much cleaner now without those other two bins. The recycle bin side lifts out with a nice handle so you can take the whole thing out to the garage to dump in the recycle bin. The garbage side does not come out, but the liners fit perfectly around the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lou

customer_reviews.title: This the best trash/recycling can!
customer_reviews.text: This the best trash/recycling can. Narrow depth so it doesn't take up a lot of space, but surprisingly a lot of trash and recycling fit in it. Cleans easily. Easy to remove the bag and recycling holder. I like that there is a metal piece that comes down to hold and hide the top of the bag. The bag has never slipped off the container. It is extremely quiet when opening and closing. I have been recommending this to many people. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L Haysbert

product_meta.title: simplehuman 58 Liter Rectangular Hands-Free Dual Compartment Recycling Kitchen Step Trash Can with Soft-Close Lid, Brushed Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Size:58 Liter Rectangular Recycler| Color:Brushed Stainless SteelOur dual compartment stainless steel rectangular step can makes it easy to neatly sort your trash and recyclables in one convenient, space-efficient space. On one side, it features an innovative 'liner pocket' that stores and dispenses liners from inside the can for a faster liner change. The other side has a convenient handled bucket for easy lifting and disposal of all your recyclables. The stainless steel liner rim grips the liner and keeps it hidden. A strong wide steel pedal is designed to last, and our patented lid shox technology ensures a smooth, silent close every time. Code H liner refill packs store perfectly in this can's liner pocket.

BRAND STORY
We design tools that help people become more efficient at home.

Day to day life has room for improvement. That's the basic thinking behind simplehuman. Many activities in our daily routine are so basic that we take them for granted. Washing our hands, cleaning up after a meal, grooming and prepping our appearance. Through innovation and new technologies, we find ways to streamline these simple tasks. We call our products tools for efficient living.
feature_bullets: 10-YEAR WARRANTY - We use the best materials and solid engineering so our products will last in tough environments like your home or office for years.
ECO-FRIENDLY - Our dual compartment trash can makes recycling easy -- one side for trash, one side for easy disposal of recyclables.
SOFT SILENT-CLOSE LID - Patented lid shox technology controls the motion of the lid for a slow, silent close — no banging or loud noises.
KEEPS YOUR TRASH BAG FROM SLIPPING - Stainless steel liner rim flips up for a quick and easy trash bag change, then closes over the bag to hold it tightly in place and keep it hidden from sight.
STRONG WIDE STEEL PEDAL - Engineered to last 150,000 steps — that's more than 20 steps a day for 20 years!
ENHANCE YOUR TRASH EXPERIENCE - Our code H custom fit liners provide an even better fit — no bunching or slipping for a cleaner trash experience.
FINGERPRINT-PROOF COATING INFUSED WITH AGION - an EPA-registered antimicrobial agent proven to inhibit the growth of bacteria, fungi, mold, and mildew on our stainless steel surfaces.
LINER STORAGE POCKET - Keep your code H custom-fit liners where you need them. Dispense them one by one for a faster bag change.
22"W x 14.2"D x 25.8"H with lid closed; 22"W x 14.2"D x 36"H with lid open

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,977 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
